meanings.definition: A person who continues to live or exist after facing a life-threatening situation.
meanings.sent1: The survivor of the shipwreck was finally rescued.
meanings.sent2: The survivor of the earthquake found shelter in a safe place.
meanings.sent3: The survivor of the camping trip forgot to pack marshmallows.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a survivor in a sea of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The survivor's tale of bravery inspired many.

meanings.definition: An organism that remains alive after a catastrophic event.
meanings.sent1: The survivor plant bloomed beautifully after the wildfire.
meanings.sent2: The survivor fish adapted to the polluted waters.
meanings.sent3: The survivor tree stood tall despite the storm's strong winds.
meanings.sent4: The survivor bacteria thrived in extreme conditions.
meanings.sent5: The survivor species evolved to overcome threats.

meanings.definition: One who outlives another person or group.
meanings.sent1: The survivor of the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: The survivor of the duel emerged victorious.
meanings.sent3: The survivor of the party was the last one dancing.
meanings.sent4: She was the survivor of the bet among friends.
meanings.sent5: The survivor of the siblings inherited the family heirloom.
